widget.name: Moodle
widget.author: Moodle Mobile team
widget.platform:
< widget xmlns = " http://www.w3.org/ns/widgets " xmlns: gap = " http://phonegap.com/ns/1.0 " xmlns: android = " http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android " id = " com.moodle.moodlemobile " versionCode = " 36100 " android-versionCode = " 36100 " version = " 3.6.1 " > < nombre > Moodle </ nombre >
< descripción > Aplicación oficial de Moodle </ descripción >
< author href = " http://moodle.com " email = " mobile@moodle.com " > Equipo Moodle Mobile </ autor >
< edit-config target = " CFBundleShortVersionString " file = " * -Info.plist " mode = " merge " > < cadena > 3.6.1 </ cadena > </ edit-config >
< gap : nombre de plataforma = " ios " /> < gap : nombre de plataforma = " android " />
< origen de acceso = " * " /> < access origin = " tel: * " launch-external = " yes " /> < access origin = " mailto: * " launch-external = " yes " /> < access origin = " geo: * " launch-external = " yes " />
< allow-navigation href = " cdvfile: * " /> < allow-navigation href = " content: * " /> < allow-navigation href = " data: * " /> < allow-navigation href = " * " />
< allow-intent href = " * " /> < allow-intent href = " tel: * " /> < allow-intent href = " sms: * " /> < allow-intent href = " mailto: * " /> < allow-intent href = " geo: * " />
< nombre de preferencia = " versión de phonegap " valor = " cli-8.1.1 " /> < preferences name = " LoadUrlTimeoutValue " value = " 60000 " /> < nombre de preferencia = " orientación " valor = " predeterminado " /> < nombre de preferencia = " dispositivo de destino " valor = " universal " /> < nombre de preferencia = " pantalla completa " valor = " falso " /> < nombre de preferencia = " permanecer en la vista web " valor = " falso " /> < nombre de preferencia = " webviewbounce " valor = " falso " /> < preferences name = " prerendered-icon " value = " true " /> < Preferencia nombre = " carga-url-timeout " valor = " 60000 " /> < preferences name = " AppendUserAgent " value = " MoodleMobile " /> < nombre de preferencia = " android-minSdkVersion " valor = " 19 " /> < nombre de preferencia = " android-targetSdkVersion " valor = " 26 " /> < nombre de preferencia = " android-installLocation " value = " auto " /> < nombre de preferencia = " UIWebViewBounce " valor = " falso " /> < preferences name = " DisallowOverscroll " value = " true " /> < preferences name = " BackupWebStorage " value = " none " /> < preferences name = " KeyboardDisplayRequiresUserAction " value = " false " /> < preferences name = " AllowInlineMediaPlayback " value = " true " /> < preferences name = " SplashMaintainAspectRatio " value = " true " /> < preferences name = " SplashScreenDelay " value = " 15000 " /> < preferences name = " SplashShowOnlyFirstTime " value = " false " />
< feature name = " StatusBar " > < param name = " ios-package " value = " CDVStatusBar " onload = " true " /> </ feature >
< preferences name = " AndroidPersistentFileLocation " value = " Compatibility " /> < preferences name = " iosPersistentFileLocation " value = " Compatibility " />
< icon src = " icon.png " /> < gap : splash src = " splash.png " />

< nombre de preferencia = " permisos " valor = " ninguno " />
< edit-config target = " NSCameraUsageDescription " file = " * -Info.plist " mode = " merge " > < string > Necesitamos acceso a la cámara para tomar fotos y poder adjuntarlas como parte de sus envíos. </ string > </ edit-config > < edit-config target = " NSMicrophoneUsageDescription " file = " * -Info.plist " mode = " merge " > < string > Necesitamos acceso de micrófono para grabar sonidos para que pueda adjuntarlos como parte de sus envíos. </ string > </ edit-config > < edit-config target = " NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription " file = " * -Info.plist " mode = " merge " > < string > Necesitamos acceso a la biblioteca de fotos para obtener imágenes desde allí, de modo que pueda adjuntarlas como parte de sus envíos. </ string > </ edit-config >
